title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #110
body:
## Date and Time

June 06, 2023 at **14:00 UTC** [Please note the change of meeting time]

## Location 

Join Zoom Meeting
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09
Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [Cancun](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/cancun.md) & [Deneb](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.3.0) upgrade
- [Consensus layer specs v1.4.0-alpha.1](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-alpha.1)
-   EIP-4844 Implementers call 23 [Recording](https://youtu.be/lZiotV3nNIU) & [Readiness checklist](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/4844-readiness-checklist.md)
  - Changes included in the Network Upgrade (Cancun)
    - [EIP-1153: Transient storage opcodes](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153)
    - [EIP-4844: Shard Blob Transactions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4844)
    - ~~[EIP-6475: SSZ Optional](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6475)~~
    - [EIP-6780: SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6780)
  - EIPs Considered for Inclusion
    - [EIP-2537: Precompile for BLS12-381 curve operations](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2537)
    - [EIP-4788: Beacon block root in the EVM](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4788)
    - ~~[EIP-6493: SSZ Transaction Signature Scheme](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-6493)~~
    - [EIP-5656: MCOPY - Memory copying instruction](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5656)
    - [EIP-5920: PAY opcode](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-5920)
    - [EIP-7069: Revamped CALL instructions](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7069)

#### Useful resources
- Dencun upgrade [PEEPanEIP Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpnKFDl1KzGOKqwux5JaLlv)
  - [PEEPanEIP-1153 with Moody Salem](https://youtu.be/9YMEYTzzKtI)
  - [PEEPanEIP-4844 with Terence & Kasey](https://youtu.be/4lyb02wZQQ4)
  - [Peep an EIP #3: EIP-2537 in five slides with Alex Vlasov](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=al4YpfDVmS4&list=PL4cwHXAawZxpnKFDl1KzGOKqwux5JaLlv&index=4&t=110s&pp=gAQBiAQB)

#### Other Protocol Development & Research
  - Verkle Implementers [Call #2 Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/802), Call # 1 [Recording](https://youtu.be/tAk0eNBqR8c)
  - EOF Implementers Meeting [Recording 15](https://youtu.be/K0noL2zsagI) Notes [15](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1w_yoxm0O-RwX7cguBRSjMYs5qv40uYoh3961MNS1sEg/edit#) 
     - [EOF Mega specs](https://notes.ethereum.org/@ipsilon/mega-eof-specification)
### 2. Events, Fellowship, Hackathon
- [Ethereum Protocol Fellowship](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/06/01/ethereum-protocol-fellowship-fourth-apps-open) applications are opened now till **June 16** 
- [ETHPrague hackathon](https://ethprague.com/ ) June 9-11, 2023
- [DeFi Summit](https://praguedefisummit.com/)
- [Devconnect - Istanbul](https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/04/20/announcing-devconnect-ist) - November 13-19, 2023.
### 3. General updates/discussion
- ECH Stats.
    - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/EthCatHerders) - 6594 Followers
    - [Discord](https://discord.io/EthCatHerders) - 2010 users
    - [YouTube](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A) - 3106 subscribers
    - [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/ethereum-cat-herders/) - 292 Followers
- ECH engineering
  - ECH Website 
    - A page for [Dencun](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun)    
    - Looking for a Frontend dev for a subdomain to the ECH website [Ref.](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/357#issue-1742849057)
- ECH Operations 
   - YouTube Shorts
     - PEEPanEIP shorts [Community Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxr020waJCI0dZAfPAW2naK1)
     - Splitting the ECH meeting video to create a general community update video and share it with the community
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight) & [EIPsInsight website](https://eipsinsight.com) 
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)
- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev Execution [Notes 162](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/797)
  - All Core Dev Consensus [Notes 110](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/800)
  - EIPIP [meeting 81](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20081.md)
  - EIP Editing Office Hour Meeting 18 [Recording](https://youtube.com/live/9-BxFGnJjNo?feature=share) & Meeting 18 [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/240)

### 4. New initiative/association
- Update ECH access
  - [x] Discord, 
  - [ ] Twitter, 
  - [x] Medium
- Contributors to send weekly Tweets or repost on social media to increase reach
- Any new ideas for community engagement?

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [109](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20109.md)

#### The date for the next meeting is June 20, 2023

 (If anything else, leave a comment.)

I have continually documented in the (currently closed) [EIP-6269](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269) why it is relevant to reconsider this, and numerous people have also shown support, e.g. on Twitter (I have linked some of them) & @xinbenlv also can see my arguments why it is important (see his comments [here](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269#issuecomment-1497701923)). I kindly ask you to reconsider your decision as I really think it is wrong to close this important, definitional EIP.

> I have continually documented in the (currently closed) [EIP-6269](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269) why it is relevant to reconsider this, and numerous people have also shown support, e.g. on Twitter (I have linked some of them) & @xinbenlv also can see my arguments why it is important (see his comments [here](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6269#issuecomment-1497701923)). I kindly ask you to reconsider your decision as I really think it is wrong to close this important, definitional EIP. 

Yes, given the context of zkEVM, I think it's worthy to reopen this discussion about defining what's considered "EVM compliance"

Also we shall discuss it to be whether an informational or meta EIP?

@pcaversaccio 
Just for you to know, EIP editors decide to merge or not merge a proposal to the EIPs repository. Should you want to discuss this proposal with them, my recommendation will be to add a comment to the EIPIP meeting [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/241). If possible, join the meeting; if not, leave an explanation.

> @pcaversaccio Just for you to know, EIP editors decide to merge or not merge a proposal to the EIPs repository. Should you want to discuss this proposal with them, my recommendation will be to add a comment to the EIPIP meeting [Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/241). If possible, join the meeting; if not, leave an explanation.

Thanks! I added it to the agenda with an explanation.
